title: Activity-Based Attitudinal Learning Design and Assessment Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A competency development course for in-service secondary science educators applying activity-based learning in an online smartphone environment and assessing attitudinal changes.

learning_goals: Learners can create lesson plans reflecting four attitudinal elements (affective, cognitive, behavioral, and social) using activity-based design strategies.
Learners can develop tools to measure attitudinal learning outcomes through project-based assessment.
Learners can design and operate activity-based learning modules applicable even in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
